content: संभोगः {@--1@} Enjoyment(in general), pleasure, delight; सत्संभोगफलाः श्रियः <ls>Subhāṣ.</ls> {@--2@} Possession, use, occupation; <ls>Ms. 8. 200.</ls> {@--3@} Carnal enjoyment, sexual union, copulation; संभोगांते मम समुचितो हस्तसंवाहनानां <ls>Me. 96.</ls> {@--4@} A lecher, catamite. {@--5@} A sub-division of the sentiment of love; see under शृंगार.
